a.n: Ben Fogle: New Lives In The Wild IV (4)

p.k: Documentary series in which adventurer Ben Fogle meets people who have given up the rat race to start a new life in the wilderness. Ben meets a former communications manager who gave up her old life to train huskies in the Swedish Arctic Circle. Gaynor and her husband teach Ben how to handle himself and the dogs in temperatures of up to minus 30 degrees.
